subject: Collaboration Proposal – Testing & Reviewing the VAM Pro Linear Motor for the Spanish Sim Racing Community
description_text:
Hello Simsonn team,

My name is Erik, creator of *Meroni Sim Racing*, a sim racing channel
dedicated to product testing, immersive hardware setups, and high-quality
content for the Spanish-speaking sim racing community.

I am reaching out because we are very interested in your *VAM Pro Linear
Motor – Pedals Haptic Reactor*. The concept of bringing highly accurate
vibration feedback directly into the pedals aligns perfectly with the
immersive-focused content we create, and with what our audience is actively
looking for.

We would love the opportunity to *test, analyze, and produce a complete
review* of your product, specifically tailored to the growing Spanish sim
racing market.
Our proposal includes:
What we want to create:

   -

   *Unboxing & installation overview*
   -

   *In-depth testing* (force behavior, haptic detail, tuning, compatibility)
   -

   *Driving impressions across multiple sims*
   -

   *Comparison with other haptic or vibration systems*
   -

   *Final review video + social media content*
   -

   Honest, technical, and experience-focused feedback

What this collaboration offers you:

   -

   Exposure to the *Spanish sim racing community*, a market with very
   limited content about advanced haptic systems
   -

   High-quality video content showcasing your product’s real performance
   -

   Increased visibility for Simsonn among hardware enthusiasts, rig
   builders, and professional sim racers
   -

   A trusted review from a creator who focuses on immersion, hardware
   testing, and transparent analysis

Our goal is to help more sim racers discover your technology and understand
how the VAM Pro Linear Motor can elevate their experience.

If this collaboration is of interest, I’d be happy to discuss next steps.
Thank you for your time — we would be excited to work with you.

Best regards,


*EriK*

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik,  Thank you very much for reaching out and for your interest in our VAM Pro Linear Motor. We truly appreciate the quality of your content and the value you provide to the Spanish-speaking sim racing community — your focus on immersion and technical analysis aligns very well with what we aim to achieve with our products.  At this moment, we’re unfortunately not able to provide a free review unit. However, we would still love to support your work, so we can offer you a special 20% discount on the VAM Pro Linear Motor as a creator-exclusive rate.  If this works for you, please let us know and we will generate a dedicated discount code for your purchase.  Thank you again for considering a collaboration with us — we hope to work together and bring your audience a deeper look into our haptic technology.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team
